boardgame.name: Age of Renaissance
L_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;age de la Renaissance
Das Zeitalter der Renaissance
boardgame.description: A game that is often described as a semi-sequel to Civilization._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Players attempt to build up their cultures during the Middle Ages and Renaissance periods. The game features a card deck that holds events, payout cards, and famous leaders of the particular eras. Although all cards will turn up somewhere during the game, the timing and position in which they will be played is crucial and will ensure a different game every time._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;The main goal of each city-state is to gain points in the form of technical advances, while keeping their culture's misery level as low as possible. The payout structure is similar to those of Civilization and Advanced Civilization in that more resources of the same type yield increasingly higher payouts. This time particular payouts are triggered by card play for every player at once. An ingenious and very smooth working _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ldquo;combat_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;rdquo; system is implemented to determine province _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; and thus resource - control._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;
boardgame.boardgamehonor: 1996 Origins Awards Best Pre-20th Century Board Game Winner

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet

Condition Notes: Still in shrink. Unopened. Shipping Notes: You are welcome to come to Community Game Night (see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/thread/127654) and pick up your game in person and pay $0 for shipping. Yes, we will gladly combine orders to reduce your per item shipping costs. (To see other items to add to your order see http://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekstore.php3?action=viewuser_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;username=RoamDog). In fact, if you buy enough the shipping costs will be FREE. Please provide a contact phone number--this is ONLY in case there are shipping issues--I am NOT planning to call you. Also, if you would like tracking information, also provide a direct/external (non-BGG) email address. Finally, if at all possible, please provide a business (rather than a residential) address (this will expedite delivery) and let us know that the address you are providing is a business address. Payment Notes: US buyers: USPS money order is preferred. Western Union transfer is also acceptable. However, I can also take a Paypal payment if you have _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; 50 positive references on BGG. But the only type of Paypal payment that I can accept is one funded by a Paypal balance or an immediate bank transfer. I cannot take a Paypal payment that is funded via credit card. (Also see the note at the bottom regarding Paypal payments impact on the discounted price). If the receiver elects to not pay extra for insurance (totally up to the receiver) then the receiver agrees to assume responsibility for lost or damaged packages. Non-US buyers: Western Union wire transfer (see www.westernunion.com) is the only acceptable form of payment. Non-US buyers--Please also note that the shipping charge will be outrageously high. Probably high enough that it does not make sense to purchase this item from me. I have no control over this. Insurance will also be REQUIRED (at receiver_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s expense) for shipments to non-US addresses. Receivers outside the US must also agree to assume ALL responsibility for taxes, tariffs, customs duties, etc. If these terms are not acceptable, please do not order from me. **Note that the offered price is the discounted price for a cash (cash, money order, western union) payment. The non-discounted price (i.e. paypal payments) will be 3.0% plus 30 cents higher.

The log sheets are unused and even the player aid sheets are still attached together. The board is in perfect condition. As far as the box goes, the bottom is in pretty good shape. The top has whitening of the corners and some nicks here and there, but is sound and has no dishing. There is a sticky portion in the lower left corner of the box top that probably had a sticker at one point. There is also a Wizards of the Coast price sticker on the side next to the bar code. So the box is merely good or decent for something this old, but the components are in perfect unused condition. I will ship to the US using either priority or parcel post at your option.
